post:
[Abc-Hosters.com](http://www.abc-hosters.com) is proud to add Dedicated IPv4 France VPS servers to our line of product in Softlayer's Paris France datacenter. Take a look at our plans and see what we can offer to you.

**All vps come:**
<br />Unmanaged
<br />OpenVZ
<br />1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
<br />Proxmox Control Panel
<br />TUN/TAN Support

**Micro Dedicated VPS**
Unmanaged 
<br />1CPU Core (Shared fair use) 
<br />64MB RAM 
<br />64MB vSwap 
<br />20GB Disk 
<br />100GB Bandwidth
<br />1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
<br />OpenVZ/ProxmoxCP
<br />**$7.00/per year** - [Order Now](https://www.abc-hosters.pw/cart.php?gid=2)

**Mini Dedicated VPS**
Unmanaged 
<br />1CPU Core (Shared fair use) 
<br />96MB RAM 
<br />96MB vSwap 
<br />40GB Disk 
<br />200GB Bandwidth
<br />1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
<br />OpenVZ/ProxmoxCP
<br />**$10.00/per year** - [Order Now](https://www.abc-hosters.pw/cart.php?gid=2)

**Small Dedicated VPS**
Unmanaged 
<br />1CPU Core (Shared fair use) 
<br />128MB RAM 
<br />128MB vSwap 
<br />60GB Disk 
<br />300GB Bandwidth
<br />1 Dedicated IPv4 Address
<br />OpenVZ/ProxmoxCP
<br />**$12.00/per year** - [Order Now](https://www.abc-hosters.pw/cart.php?gid=2) - 
<br />Limit Number of order can get this for only $7.00/per year with promo code: **RWROS1569A**



For more information feel free to contact us via [support ticket](https://www.abc-hosters.pw/contact.php). Visit us at [http://www.abc-hosters.com](http://www.abc-hosters.com)
